title: Win 45,000 ARB + 50,000 THALES during March Madness!
description: Compete for 30,000 ARB pro rata rewards and 5,000 ARB March Madness prediction bracket rewards. You’ll receive an amazing 50,000 THALES and 10,000 ARB if you get a perfect bracket!

ctaSection.sectionHtml: Compete for 30,000 ARB pro rata rewards and 5,000 ARB March Madness prediction bracket rewards. You’ll receive an amazing 50,000 THALES and 10,000 ARB if you get a perfect bracket!

article.contentHtml:
March Madness is one of the biggest events on Overtime. As such, it comes with some of the craziest rewards you’ve seen here! What better way to follow March Madness than by creating your prediction bracket and competing for bragging rights and incredible prizes ( $110,000+ prize pool)?

This year, 30,000 ARB will be distributed to all March Madness players based on volume generated. Simply go to Overtime and play March Madness markets to qualify for this prize pool. An additional 5,000 ARB will be shared by the top 20 wallets with the highest number of points (based on correct picks) in their March Madness brackets.

A ridiculous 10,000 ARB + 50,000 THALES are reserved for getting a perfect bracket! Minting one bracket costs $50, and minting fees will be added to the 5,000 ARB prize pool!

Guidelines for creating your March Madness bracket

Between March 18 and March 21, go to the Overtime March Madness page to fill out your bracket and then use those picks to mint your March Madness NFT on Arbitrum.

As noted, minting costs $50 per bracket. One wallet can also create as many brackets as they wish to. The more matches you predict correctly, the more points you’ll get. This is how many points each correct prediction gets you:

  • Round of 64: 1 point
  • Round of 32: 2 points
  • Round of 16: 4 points
  • Round of 8: 8 points
  • Final Four: 16 points
  • Championship Game: 32 points

Tiebreakers will be ranked by bracket ID, where the lower number (earlier mint) bracket IDs will have an advantage. Identical brackets minted by the same wallet will be counted as one bracket. The minting fees will be distributed to winners as Overtime vouchers, while the ARB rewards will be airdropped directly. The rewards ratio per top 20 placement can be found on the Leaderboard page.

Whoever mints the Perfect Bracket that accrues a total of 192 points, will win a special prize of 50,000 THALES + 10,000 ARB. For more in-depth information on the March Madness 2024 campaign on Overtime, visit the official blog post. Note: The Overtime team reserves the right to disqualify wallets we suspect of gaming the system.

Don’t miss out on the other great incentives on Overtime

Overtime regularly organizes kickbacks, dedicated rewards for the biggest sports events and leagues, and sportsbook competitions. You can use the promotions page to keep an eye out for ongoing and future goodies you can grab, as well as find out how to qualify and how your wallet is doing on various rewards leaderboards.

title: 12,500 ARB every two weeks for all Singles and Parlay users on Arbitrum!
description: Biweekly rewards of 5,000 ARB to all Single, 5,000 ARB to all Parlay, and 2,500 ARB to all Bonus Single buyers until March 31st. Airdropped every two weeks to all users based on volume driven.

article.headerHtml: 12,500 ARB every two weeks for all Singles and Parlay users on Arbitrum!

ctaSection.sectionHtml: Airdropped biweekly rewards of 5,000 ARB to all Single buyers, 5,000 ARB to all Parlay, and 2,500 ARB to all Bonus Single buyers until March 31st. Based on volume driven. Track your rewards:  Dune dashboard.

article.contentHtml:
Take advantage of the biggest Arbitrum incentives program on Overtime Markets ever! Every two weeks, 12,500 ARB are awarded to all Thales Sports Markets users on Arbitrum.

The plan is to have a total of 7 reward rounds.

These 12,500 ARB will be split in the following way:

Singles Rewards: 5,000 ARB

Users who buy Singles on Thales SportsAMM will have their Buy Volume counted for this rewards bucket. They will split 5,000 ARB rewards at the end of the two weeks pro rata based on their total Singles Volume compared to the global Singles Volume during that period.

Track your rewards: Dune dashboard

Parlay Rewards: 5,000 ARB

Users who buy Parlay Tickets on Thales ParlayAMM will have their Buy Volume counted for this rewards bucket. They will split 5,000 ARB rewards at the end of the two weeks pro rata based on their total Parlay Volume compared to the global Parlay Volume during that period.

Track your rewards: Dune dashboard

Bonus Singles: 2,500 ARB

Buyers of Bonus Singles on Sports Markets will share 2,500 ARB per round. You can recognize bonus games by looking at the odds and finding a green number with a % symbol near it. This percentage represents the payout bonus you'll receive by wagering on that particular outcome.

title: 100,000 OP, 100,000 ARB and 180,000 THALES for all users of NBA, NFL and EPL throughout the season!
description: 100,000 OP, 100,000 ARB and 180,000 Thales for the most skilled Overtime traders of the ongoing NBA, NFL, and EPL seasons! The higher your odds and the higher the volume, the better the rewards at the end of the season. Test your skills and win big!

article.headerHtml: 100,000 OP, 100,000 ARB and 180,000 THALES for all users of NBA, NFL and EPL throughout the season!

ctaSection.sectionHtml: Play matches in the NFL, EPL, and NBA regular season to earn a share of 100k OP, 100k ARB, and 180k THALES rewards airdropped to you at the end of the season. The higher your trading volume and the higher the odds of winning positions, the higher your rewards. Track your rewards: Dune dashboard.

article.contentHtml:
We’re all about rewarding our passionate community, and this time, we’re going BIG when it comes to the most popular leagues in the world! A whopping total of 100k OP, 100k ARB, and 180k THALES will be distributed across the NBA, NFL, and EPL, with each league having its own dedicated 30k OP or ARB + 30k THALES bucket per chain. Here’s what it looks like broken down.

  • EPL on Optimism: 30,000 OP + 30,000 THALES
  • NFL on Optimism: 40,000 OP + 30,000 THALES (expired)
  • NBA on Optimism: 30,000 OP + 30,000 THALES
  • EPL on Arbitrum: 30,000 ARB + 30,000 THALES
  • NFL on Arbitrum: 40,000 ARB + 30,000 THALES (expired)
  • NBA on Arbitrum: 30,000 ARB + 30,000 THALES


Here's how the rewards are calculated.

Reward Calculation Method: Transparent and Fair

Your rewards are calculated using an updated and straightforward formula: Pn=(1-X/2)*V

P1 + P2 + P3 + Pn = user points

P denotes points per position, X denotes the implied odds of the ticket, and V means volume.

We then divide the total league rewards by all user points in the specific league. This will give you the amount of reward per point. The formula incentivizes positions with lower odds and higher volume, so the bigger you go, the more rewards you’ll get. The best part? You don’t really need to calculate all of this yourself.

You can follow your progress and see your rewards grow using Dune, all transparently and easily accessible. Track your rewards: Dune dashboard

Example 1: Low Odds with Low Volume

Say you have a parlay with the following implied Odds (X): 0.2 (20% chance of winning) and your trading Volume (V) is $500. The calculation would be as follows: Pn = (1–0.2/2) * 500 = 450 points.

Example 2: High Odds with High Volume

In this case, your implied Odds are (X): 0.8 (80% chance of winning) and your trading Volume (V) is $5000. The calculation would be as follows: Pn = (1–0.8/2) * 5000 = 3000 points.

Example 3 (Adding up your tickets total points)

In example 3, we will demonstrate how parlay totals are added together. Your first parlay has implied Odds (X): 0.6 and the trading Volume (V) is $800. This gives you a total of: Pn = (1–0.6/2) * 800 = 560 points.

The other parlay has Odds of 0.4 with $1200 in volume, leading to (1–0.4/2) * 1200 = 960 points.

Add those up and you get 960+560 = 1520 points.

Remember that parlays involving multiple incentivized leagues will be treated separately in each ranking.

For example, a parlay ticket that includes games from the EPL, NBA, and NFL will be counted in each of the three leaderboards, somewhat acting as a 3x multiplier. If the ticket involves games from two leagues, it will be counted twice in the corresponding leaderboards SportsAMM and ParlayAMM .

End-of-Season Reward Distribution

Your hard-earned rewards will be distributed at the end of each respective season. So you’ll have a whole season’s worth of excitement, culminating in a fantastic reward!

We wish every one of you a thrilling and enjoyable sports season ahead. Whether you’re an EPL enthusiast, an NFL fan, or an NBA aficionado, it’s time to dive into the action and trade on Overtime. So what are you waiting for?

The ball’s in your court. Join us at Overtime, and let’s make this sports season unforgettable! Overtime is your premier on-chain Web3 sports experience, offering an unmatched combination of excitement and transparency.

The big leagues have never been this thrilling. Join thousands of fans and get in the game today with Overtime!

title: Parlay Competition: Win 2,500 ARB and 500 OP Every Week
description: Win 500 OP or 2,500 ARB every week by being in the top 20 highest-odd parlays on Optimism and Arbitrum respectively. That’s right, going for the craziest winning parlay pays extra on Overtime. Compete with others and prove your knowledge now!

article.headerHtml: Weekly Parlay Competition: Earn 2,500 ARB and 500 OP Every Week

ctaSection.sectionHtml: Win 500 OP or 2,500 ARB every two weeks by being in the top 20 highest-odd parlays on Optimism and Arbitrum respectively. Track how you’re doing: Parlay Leaderboard.

article.contentHtml:
Overtime has recently revamped its Parlay competition with increased incentives and a better chance for everyone to get a share of the rewards!

The Parlay competition will be set in weekly rounds with a total of 2,500 ARB and 500 OP. The rewards will distributed to the top 20 winning parlays on respective chains.

The Parlay leaderboard will now incorporate a points system, where winning parlays get a boost with more games there are on the ticket and with higher buy-ins.

The calculation is as follows: points = parlayOdds * √buyin * (1+0.1*numberOfGames)

Important: The Overtime team holds the right to disqualify wallets we suspect of gaming the system.

Users who have covered 50% or more of potential combinations of their winning tickets will be disqualified.

title: Win 20,000 ARB playing 3 UEFA competitions on Overtime
description: Earn 10,000 ARB in the knockout stages of the Champions League, Europa League, and Conference League. Compete for an additional 10,000 dedicated exclusively to the Champions League Final.

article.headerHtml: Win 20,000 ARB playing the UEFA Champions League, Europa League, and Conference League

ctaSection.sectionHtml: Earn 10,000 ARB in the knockout stages of the Champions League, Europa League, and Conference League. Compete for an additional 10,000 dedicated exclusively to the Champions League Final. Track how you’re doing: Dune Dashboard.

article.contentHtml:
If you're into soccer (or football, depending on where you're from), you'll be elated to hear you can win 20,000 ARB in three UEFA competitions on Overtime. That's right - the Champions League, Europa League, and Conference League are incentivized in their knockout stages!

And since Overtime users love big games, we've dedicated 10,000 out of those 20,000 ARB to the biggest game of the season - the Champions League Final!

The rewards are handed out based on the total volume you generate. The more you play, the higher the rewards! The most insane part about all of this is that you can combine these rewards with all the other promotions taking place on Overtime.

Note: Users who have covered 50% or more of potential combinations of their winning tickets will be disqualified.

title: Stake THALES and play Overtime to earn a rewards multiplier!
description: Overtime is built on the Thales Protocol. Staking THALES and using other products built on the Thales Protocol gives you two types of rewards: Staking rewards in THALES tokens and Protocol Rewards in stablecoins. These rewards are multiplied using the Gamified Staking mechanism.

article.headerHtml: Stake THALES and play Overtime to earn a rewards multiplier!

ctaSection.sectionHtml: Overtime is built on the Thales Protocol. Staking THALES and using other products built on the Thales Protocol gives you two types of rewards: Staking rewards in THALES tokens and Protocol Rewards in stablecoins. These rewards are multiplied using the Gamified Staking mechanism.

article.contentHtml:
Did you know that staking THALES and using Thales Protocol products (including Overtime Markets) gives you a staking rewards multiplier? Here is how Gamified Staking Rewards work:

Trading Volume Points

Trading Volume points are accrued by driving trading volume through Thales Markets and Overtime Markets. For every 1 USD of volume driven across Thales products, you get 1 point. This means that your total points from Trading Volume are equal to the sum of your total USD Trading Volume from Thales Markets and Overtime Markets (multiplied by 1).

AMM LP Points

AMM LP points are accrued by depositing USD into various AMM Liquidity Pools across Thales products (including Thales AMM Pool, SportsAMM pool, ParlayAMM pool, etc.).

For each 1 USD deposited into a LP pool you get 0.1 points. This means that your total points from AMM LP-ing are equal to the sum of your total USD deposits from Thales Markets and Overtime Markets LP pools, multiplied by 0.1.

Vaults points

Vaults Points are accrued by depositing USD into various Vaults across Thales products (including Thales Market Vaults, and Overtime Markets Vaults ). Vaults offer a mechanism for automatic trading, i.e. buying positions when certain conditions are met (for example, buying positions with 75% odds of winning and any discount).

For each 1 USD deposited into a Vault, you get 0.2 points. This means that your total points from Vaults deposits are equal to the sum of your total Vaults USD deposits, multiplied by 0.2.

THALES Staked Multiplier

The amount of THALES you have staked determines the multiplier for your total points. The more THALES you stake, the higher the final multiplier of your total points. THALESStakedMultiplier = 1 + UserThalesStaked /{StakingDivider} THALES Staked Multiplier minimum value is 1 and maximum value is 2.

Your final points that determine your share of THALES Gamified Staking Bonus rewards is equal to the sum of all your accrued points multiplied by the THALES Staked Multiplier. Total Points = (Trading Volume points + AMM LP points + Vaults Points) x THALES Staked Multiplier

title: Win 20,000 ARB in NHL and 30,000 ARB in MLB markets
description: Compete for 20,000 ARB and 30,000 ARB in rewards for the NHL and MLB until the end of the season. Higher volume = higher rewards.

article.headerHtml: Win 20,000 ARB in NHL and 30,000 ARB in MLB markets

ctaSection.sectionHtml: Compete for 20,000 ARB and 30,000 ARB in rewards for the NHL and MLB until the end of the season. Higher volume = higher rewards. Track how you’re doing: MLB dashboard. and NHL dashboard.

article.contentHtml:
User incentives on Overtime are getting more ridiculous by the day! If you are a fan of the NHL and MLB, prepare for great news: you can win 20,000 ARB and 30,000 ARB in each league respectively until the end of the season.

The rewards are distributed pro rata, meaning the top wallets will share the prize pool based on how much volume they’ve generated.

The MLB and NHL join the NBA and NFL on the list of US-based leagues with incredible additional rewards for users. But that’s not even remotely close to being the entire promo offering on Overtime!

But that’s not even remotely close to being the entire promo offering on Overtime!

ctaSection.sectionHtml: Compete for 2,000 ARB dedicated to UFC 300, one of the biggest events in the world of fighting! Rewards are distributed pro rata, meaning higher volume = higher rewards. Track how you’re doing: Dune Dashboard.

article.contentHtml:
DEGENS, WHAT IS YOUR PROFESSION?

On Apr 13, all eyes will be on the historic UFC 300 event, boasting the best fight card ever assembled.

That's not all – you can win up to 2000 ARB in rewards on Overtime! Rewards will be distributed pro rata, meaning the higher your volume, the higher the prizes. But that’s not even remotely close to being the entire promo offering on Overtime!

title: 90% refund in ARB tokens for all SportsAMM and ParlayAMM LPs on losing weeks!
description: Every two weeks, all AMM LPs that had a negative performance will be airdropped ARB equal to 90% of their negative PnL in dollar value. Capped at 10,000 ARB per two weeks.

article.headerHtml: 90% refund in ARB tokens for all SportsAMM and ParlayAMM LPs on losing weeks!

ctaSection.sectionHtml: Every two weeks, all AMM LPs that had a negative performance will be airdropped ARB equal to 90% of their negative PnL in dollar value. Capped at 10,000 ARB per two weeks.

article.contentHtml:
If you don’t already know, you can provide liquidity for Overtime Markets and ‘be the house’ and share its profits by participating in two liquidity pools: SportsAMM and ParlayAMM

Loss Rebates ARB rewards are reserved to be distributed to AMM Liquidity Providers in case of a negative PnL week. Rewards are meant to be equal to 90% of dollar value of potential losses incurred from AMM Liquidity Providing across SportsAMM and ParlayAMM.

The biweekly round of ARB rewards will reserve a hard cap of 10,000 ARB tokens for Loss Rebates equal to 90% of dollar value of potential losses incurred from AMM Liquidity Providing.

Any AMM LP losses will be eligible for ARB rewards from this round.

In case the 90% of dollar value of Liquidity Providing losses for the mentioned two weeks is greater than the dollar value of 10,000 ARB at the end of the round, the 10,000 ARB will be split pro rata between all LPs that incurred losses based on their comparison to global PnL losses of their respective pool.

You can earn additional incentives by using other products built on Thales Protocol. For more information, check out this link.
